findFilesByPackageAndPaths

public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> findFilesByPackageAndPaths(java.lang.Class klass,
                                                                               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> paths,
                                                                               java.lang.String matchingFilename)

Find all the files in the directory trees rooted in the given paths that are in a directory corresponding to the package of the specified ciass and match the file name specified.

Parameters:
klass - Class for package to search
paths - List of fully-qualified path names to search
matchingFilename - name for files to match
Returns:
Array of fully-qualitifed matching file names
